casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Mario Andrette MCNEILL 446A13-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Assistant Appellate Defender, Andrew DeSimone, Assistant Appellate Defender, G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, for McNeill, Mario Andrette. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, William West, District Attorney, Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of April 2016 by Defendant to Amend the Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
